clock Cobj;
automata_declaration
state_updater
states
base
rules
makingTrash //states declarions
//transitions
callBot? PmakingTrash = 1
wait? PmakingTrash = 2
waitDONE? PmakingTrash = 0

//transitions
callBot? PpickingUp = 1
trash? PpickingUp = 2
trashDONE? PpickingUp = 3

//transitions
trash? PthrowingPaper = 1

agents
ecoBot

office

ecoBot_office2hallway! CecoBot > 1 PecoBot = -13, CecoBot= 0

CecoBot>7 PecoBot = 4, CecoBot= 0

trash! CecoBot =0,PecoBot=-11 CecoBot > 1 && ( PpickingUp==1 ) && ( PthrowingPaper==0 )

throwTrashDONE! CecoBot =0, PecoBot=1 CecoBot > 3 && ( PthrowingPaper==3 )
throwTrash! CecoBot =0,PecoBot=-22 CecoBot > 1 && (Pbin==2) && ( PthrowingPaper==2 )
throwTrashDONE! CecoBot =0, PecoBot=2 CecoBot > 3 && ( PthrowingPaper==3 )
throwTrash! CecoBot =0,PecoBot=-33 CecoBot > 1 && (Pbin==3) && ( PthrowingPaper==2 )
throwTrashDONE! CecoBot =0, PecoBot=3 CecoBot > 3 && ( PthrowingPaper==3 )
throwTrash! CecoBot =0,PecoBot=-44 CecoBot > 1 && (Pbin==4) && ( PthrowingPaper==2 )
throwTrashDONE! CecoBot =0, PecoBot=4 CecoBot > 3 && ( PthrowingPaper==3 )

human
//no local declarations used

office

bin
//no local declarations used

office
base
hallway
trashRoom

obj

idle
lose
